original_text: And they rose up early in the morning, and the sun shone upon the water, and the Moabites saw the water on the other side as red as blood:
korean_text: 아침에 모압 사람이 일찍이 일어나서 해가 물에 비치므로 맞은편 물이 붉어 피와 같음을 보고

sentences.original_text: And they rose up early in the morning
and the sun shone upon the water
and the Moabites saw the water on the other side
